title: Wikiwand - Traditional Asian medicine
description: Traditional Asian medicine is a collective term for several types of traditional medicine practiced in Asia.
cleaned_text: Traditional Asian medicine From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia Traditional Asian medicine is a collective term for several types of [traditional medicine](/en/Traditional_medicine) practiced in Asia. [[1]](#cite_note-1) These include the medical traditions of: - South Asia [Ayurveda](/en/Ayurveda) [Tamil Nadu](/en/Siddha_medicine)(Siddha) - - West Asia [Middle East](/en/Unani_medicine)(Unani) [Iran](/en/Iranian_traditional_medicine) -
